column3: Please squash your commits according to https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#squashing-commits

I squashed the commits as requested. Going forward with these `MiniWallet` test "refactors", should I continue to make one PR per test file rewrite, or should I batch multiple test file rewrites in each PR?
> should I continue to make one PR per test file rewrite, or should I batch multiple test file rewrites in each PR?\n\nWhatever makes more sense to you
_utxos is a private member, so you can't read it directly. It needs to be accessed via a getter method that also marks the utxo as spent (pops it)
Good point. What do you think of this approach? https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/20385/commits/650ba88013ff0fb8cf08b00d5e7c674cf5b16a22

```suggestion
    def get_utxo(self, *, txid=''):
```

please force named arguments for this
